ai-patthana8.7:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.7:1.1_0: It doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana8.7:2.1_0: You should definitely regard them as having no use for them.
ai-patthana8.7:3.1_0: It is a condition for the immaterial condition,
ai-patthana8.7:4.1_0: the condition being by way of teaching, condition, not by way of teaching condition.
ai-patthana8.7:5.1_0: Two on the one object, two on the objects of meditation,
